effects.display_string:
(2) Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a inning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your inning Streak!

(4) Set: When you gain a stack of inning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Bloodthirst increases the damage of your next Rampage by 15%.
Set: When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, the damage of your next Bloodthirst is increased by 20%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

spells.description: Use: Conjure a Spectral Scythe, dealing 889,777 Shadow damage to your target and 123,580 Shadow damage in a 15 yd cone to enemies behind your target. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Carefully balance the Egg's incubation. While stationary, gain 156 Strength every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while moving. While moving, gain 149 of your highest secondary stat every 1 sec, up to 30 times. Diminishes while stationary. 

Additional stacks above 20 grant 60% reduced benefit.
Use: Suspend the Egg's incubation state for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
